body_html:
@craftlk I overwrite the CROSSTOOL under subdir in bazel-tensorflow and that worked.
By the way eigen said that they support AVX-512 now(Eigen3.3.0/Tensorflow0.11+/require --copt='-DEIGEN_ENABLE_AVX512)
On the other hand @benoitsteiner implemented the AVX-512 support for Fixedpoint last week. However, due to the use of AVX-512 DQ in that part, that implement cannot compiling on KNL.
